title: build: failed to build 8g with mingw-64bit
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

$ cd $GOROOT/src/cmd/8g
$ make
quietgcc -fno-common -I"c:/MinGW64/go/include" -ggdb -O2 -c
"/c/MinGW64/go/src/cmd/8g/gsubr.c"
c:/MinGW64/go/src/cmd/8g/gsubr.c:874:14: error: cast from pointer to integer of
different size [-Werror=pointer-to-int-cast]
cc1.exe: all warnings being treated as errors

make: *** [gsubr.o] Error 1
$

Please use labels and text to provide additional information.

$ gcc -v
Using built-in specs.
COLLECT_GCC=c:\MinGW64\bin\gcc.exe
COLLECT_LTO_WRAPPER=c:/mingw64/bin/../libexec/gcc/x86_64-w64-mingw32/4.6.1/lto-w
rapper.exe
Target: x86_64-w64-mingw32
Configured with: ../../src/gcc-4.6.1/configure --build=x86_64-w64-mingw32 --enab
le-targets=all --enable-languages=c,c++,fortran,objc,obj-c++ --enable-libgomp --
enable-lto --enable-libstdcxx-debug --enable-version-specific-runtime-libs --ena
ble-fully-dynamic-string --with-gnu-ld --disable-werror --disable-nls --disable-
win32-registry --prefix=/mingw64tdm --with-local-prefix=/mingw64tdm --with-pkgve
rsion=tdm64-1 --with-bugurl=http://tdm-gcc.tdragon.net/bugs
Thread model: win32
gcc version 4.6.1 (tdm64-1)
$ hg id
d5db27e9a6fd tip
